## Overview

Parker Solar Probe (PSP) is a NASA mission to study the Sun's corona and inner heliosphere.

PSP timeline:

- 2018-08-12: Launch
- 2018-10-03: First Venus flyby
- 2018-11-05: First perihelion
- 2019-01-19: First aphehion
- ...
